privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Content: AXA Barbershop ("we," "us," "our," or "Company") operates the axabarbershop.fi website (the "Site"). This Privacy Policy explains our practices regarding the collection, use, and protection of your personal data. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring you have a positive experience on our website.
privacy.section2Intro: We collect information in the following ways:
privacy.section2Item1: Booking Information: When you book an appointment, we collect your name, email address, and phone number.
privacy.section2Item2: Contact Form Data: If you submit a contact form, we collect the information you provide (name, email, message).
privacy.section2Item3: Website Usage Data: We use Google Analytics to collect information about how you interact with our website (pages visited, time spent, etc.).
privacy.section2Item4: Cookie Data: We store information about your cookie preferences in your browser's local storage.
privacy.section2Item5: Automatically Collected Information: IP address, browser type, operating system, and referring website (via Google Analytics).
privacy.section3Intro: We process your personal data for the following purposes:
privacy.section3Item1: Service Delivery: To fulfill your booking requests and provide you with information about our services.
privacy.section3Item2: Communication: To respond to your inquiries and contact requests.
privacy.section3Item3: Website Improvement: To understand how visitors use our website and improve its functionality and user experience.
privacy.section3Item4: Legal Compliance: To comply with applicable laws and regulations in Finland (GDPR and LPDP).
privacy.section4Content: We use cookies on our website to enhance your experience. Cookies are small files stored on your device. You can control cookie preferences through the cookie consent banner that appears when you first visit our site.
privacy.cookieEssentialDesc: These cookies are necessary for basic website functionality, such as navigation and language preferences. They cannot be disabled without affecting site functionality.
privacy.cookieAnalyticsDesc: These cookies (Google Analytics) help us understand how visitors interact with our site. They are only loaded if you consent to analytics.
privacy.section5Intro: Under GDPR and Finnish data protection laws, you have the following rights:
privacy.section5Item1Desc: You can request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.
privacy.section5Item2Desc: You can request that we correct inaccurate or incomplete data.
privacy.section5Item3Desc: You can request that we delete your personal data (subject to legal obligations).
privacy.section5Item4Desc: You can request your data in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format.
privacy.section5Item5Desc: You can withdraw your consent to cookie tracking and analytics at any time by updating your cookie preferences.
privacy.section6Content: We retain booking information for 2 years to comply with Finnish business regulations. Contact form submissions are retained for 1 year. Analytics data is retained according to Google's default retention policy (26 months). You can request deletion of your data at any time.
privacy.section7Content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. Our website uses HTTPS encryption for secure data transmission. However, no method of data transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.section8Content: Our website may contain links to third-party websites, including Google Maps and Google Analytics. This Privacy Policy applies only to our website. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of external websites. Please review their privacy policies before providing your information.
privacy.section9Content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date. Your continued use of the website following the posting of revised Privacy Policy means that you accept and agree to the changes.
privacy.section10Intro: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us:
